DOC.brief_summary: This study verify whether cranio-cervical flexion coordination ( motor control ) muscle strength training protocol effective improve muscle proprioception muscle strength protocol patient chronic neck pain . Hypothesis : The craniocervical flexion ( motor control ) muscle strength training protocol improve muscle function proprioception muscle strength protocol patient chronic cervical pain . Objective : To find applying strength therapeutic exercise protocol craniocervical flexion coordination ( motor control ) train effective strength articular repositioning protocol carry craniocervical flexion test patient chronic cervical pain .
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness Exercises Protocol Management Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Neck pain delimit two horizontal line , one low portion occipital region one spinous process first thoracic vertebra . This pain reproduce neck movement exploratory provocation test . Scientific study show least two three people experience neck pain throughout life . Some cause traumatism whiplash although sometimes pain idiopathic . This study verify whether cranio-cervical flexion coordination ( motor control ) muscle strength training protocol effective improve muscle proprioception muscle strength protocol patient chronic neck pain . The project design randomize control evaluator-blinded clinical trial two intervention group : Group 1 ( experimental ) carry motor control exercise cranio-cervical flexion train strength-endurance exercise . Group 2 ( control ) carry exercise improve muscle strength-endurance proprioception . Measurements do begin study , pre post-treatment , one month two month treatment throughout six month treatment . Each session last 45 minute therapy perform without provoke patient symptom . Intervention Experimental group 1 : carry intermuscular coordination exercise cranio-cervical training , follow Jull et al1 , 2 exercise increase strength-endurance neck flexor muscle . Control group 2 : carry proprioception exercise articular reposition training exercise increase strength-endurance neck flexor muscle . They perform way experimental group protocol .
DOC.criteria: History cervical pain least 3 month . Between 18 55 year old . Altered movement and/or loss cervical control . Pain palpation muscle treat . Previous history central neurological condition . Previous surgery cervical , cranial , scapular waist , upper limb jaw . Having receive specific treatment therapy cervical region 6 month prior study . Neck pain headache musculoskeletal cause . Any disorder prevents physical activity . Having receive psychological treatment due neck pain . Patients fibromyalgia , rheumatoid arthritis , vascular disease , neoplasm vestibular system pathology .
